general.description: Stormgard is, despite it's harsh, icy environment, a heavily populated world. This is because several members of the emperor's family have made this world their home, and inevitably that means that imperial bureaucrats, courtiers, and general hangers-on are go√Øng to move here too. Industry is a popular pastime here, with the valuable minerals hiding beneath the ice sheets.
general.bar: This bar is warm and cozy despite the howling winds outside. Windows show off the breathtaking view of the sunlight reflecting off the ice crystals.
